versions.content: You are a storyteller in a world where dreams come to life. Describe the most vivid dream that has manifested in reality.
versions.details: This prompt is designed to spark creativity and encourage imaginative storytelling. It combines elements of fantasy with the familiar concept of dreams to create a unique narrative starting point.

versions.content: Analyze this code snippet and suggest improvements for readability and efficiency: [Insert code snippet here]
versions.details: This prompt helps developers improve their code quality by providing specific suggestions for refactoring.

versions.content: As an expert software developer, analyze the following code and provide specific recommendations for improving: 1) Code readability 2) Performance optimization 3) Best practices 4) Potential bugs. [Insert code snippet here]
versions.details: Enhanced version with more structured output and comprehensive code analysis categories.
